title: What to Put in Your Spring Forage Mix

tasks.task: Discuss spring cover crop forage options
subtasks: Engage in conversation with colleague Dylan
Utilize smart mix calculator for cover crop mix recommendations
Select appropriate drill method for cover crop seeding
Determine planting date and expected growth period for cover crop

Select grass species (e.g., spring oats, annual ryegrass)

Include mycorrhizal additives (e.g., flax) for soil enhancement

Estimate desired seeding density (e.g., 1.5 million seeds per acre)
Finalize cover crop mix composition and quantities
